Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign into law A.4558B/S.61B, which would prohibit discrimination on the basis of gender expression or identity and expand the State's hate crimes statute to include offenses committed against someone on the basis of his or her gender expression or identity.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Prohibit discrimination on the basis of gender expression or identity. (A.4558B/S.61B)

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the United States Congress to pass and the President to sign H.R.2282/S.1006, the Equality Act, which would amend the Civil Rights Acts of 1964 and 1968 to include sexual orientation and gender identity as prohibited categories of discrimination or segregation with respect to employment, public accommodation and housing.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting conversion therapy

Items.MatterName: Amending the definitions of sexual orientation and gender in the New York city human rights law.
